hiveArticle.title: Hyderabad Travel #1 - Charminar
hiveArticle.body:
So recently I travelled to Hyderabad for a day and visited one of the famous tourist attraction in Hyderabad that is Charminar. It is constructed in 1591 and has a mosque on the top floor. 

While going to the Charminar you will be travelling through the small lanes where there are jewellery shop on both the sides and Charminar looked amazing through that small lane.

![IMG_20180324_123716.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmd3rxWjBrN5iFPLAZjekEf5SkPRsswTJdPvf6eNFxKSd6/IMG_20180324_123716.jpg)

<hr>

A lot of activities happens near charminar like a small get together or a wedding ceremony because of the Iconic figure.

![IMG_20180324_123759.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXckMwq3khbiX3Cxx9GK7MyDWaEM5F1u75LYsakY3QhLn/IMG_20180324_123759.jpg)

<hr>

There are windows on the top floor and almost all of them are totally identical on each sides.

![IMG_20180324_123829.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXa24oddNjK1UoRkkBJqVVNgAPRc6zQTu78rC8wgDKqu4/IMG_20180324_123829.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180324_123951.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZKDScYfWij17VwBx9uG9r9QEuAJaUUZBhapcfMUzqsBP/IMG_20180324_123951.jpg)

<hr>

There is also a Temple located at the base of Charminar.

![IMG_20180324_124036.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcLhPpN4a9aBZH3nWUokXEBJhAFmZZJX7tcwwJ9kSgr1L/IMG_20180324_124036.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180324_124051.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdoQyHP2royNZj2eMLqt5GZHzUxJ3vTmw3LYMV9pEs4mD/IMG_20180324_124051.jpg)

<hr>

Also, Charminar was getting painted that's why you can see bamboo sticks on the two minars of the right side.

![IMG_20180324_124247.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmP1LNTpzw4nTABa3iuLJ9cVKvoSb2jdHWtTVD3XZn5qsK/IMG_20180324_124247.jpg)
